scripts.install: npm run install.npm && npm run install.typings
scripts.install.npm: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.install.typings: cd server && typings install && cd ../client && typings install
scripts.build: npm run build.server & npm run build.client
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/ server/build/ server/node_modules/ server/typings client/build/ client/node_modules/ client/typings
